sentence: The Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.6695 per share on the Common Stock and on the Series A and Series B ESOP Convertible Class A Preferred Stock of the Company, payable on or after February 15, 2017 to Common Stock shareholders of record at the close of business on January 20, 2017, and to Series A and Series B ESOP Convertible Class A Preferred Stock shareholders of record at the start of business on January 20, 2017.
The Board of Directors of MSA Safety ( MSA ) declared a first quarter dividend of 33 cents per share on common stock, payable March 10, 2017 to shareholders of record on February 14, 2017.
The Board also declared a dividend of 56-1/4 cents per share on preferred stock, payable March 1, 2017 to shareholders of record on February 14, 2017.
Chatham Lodging Trust ( CLDT ) has declared a monthly common share dividend of $0.11 for January 2017.
The common dividend is payable February 24, 2017, to shareholders of record on January 31, 2017.
Luxfer Holdings ( LXFR ) declared an interim dividend of 12.5 cents (before deduction of depositary fees) per American Depositary Share.
The dividend will be payable on February 1, 2017, to shareholders of record at close of business on January 13, 2017.
Issuer Direct Corporation ( ISDR ) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.05 per share.
The dividend is payable February 10, 2017 to shareholders of record at the close of business on January 23, 2017.
The ex-dividend date will be January 19, 2017.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
